name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 18, Jinan, Shandong. As CITIC lowered the standard and allocation of real estate projects, the owners knelt down in the developer's lobby to defend their rights.
 On the evening of October 19th, Zoucheng, Shandong Province. Zoucheng No. 1 Middle School canceled the weekend holiday. Thousands of students shouted in the corridor, "Holiday! Holiday!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Halloween is approaching. On the evening of October 18, a woman wearing a "Lina Belle" doll costume was selling key chains on Julu Road in Shanghai and was subsequently taken away by the police. Some netizens said, "It seems that there will be no Halloween in Julu Road this year."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 19, students from a middle school in Zoucheng, Shandong, protested against the school's use of its biweekly break to hold a sports meeting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A video poster received a call from the school leader of Zoucheng No. 1 Middle School asking him to delete the video, and said that Principal Chen and the Internet police department had obtained all his personal information, and if he did not delete it, they would continue to call him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 19, Jiangsu. A blogger posted a photo of a pig specimen on Xiaohongshu, and a netizen in the comment section used it to insinuate that Xi Jinping "really looks like a human being." Another netizen replied, "Don't think I don't know what you want to say." The post has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 19, Jiangxi. A boy's cochlear implant, which cost him nearly 600,000 yuan, was lost in the school dormitory. According to the child's mother, Ms. Lan, the child's cochlear implant was lost at 6 a.m. on September 11 and has not been found yet. The boy posted a video saying that the school shirked its responsibility, causing him to drop out of school and stay at home, and he was very upset in the silent world.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 17, it was reported that Miao, director of the Linchi Market Supervision Office in Zouping, Shandong, was murdered. His family said that the suspect had just been released from prison. On the morning of July 8, Miao was stabbed to death by the suspect Wang in the lobby of the Market Supervision Bureau.
On the 19th, it was reported that the head of Shanzhuang Village in Ji'an, Jiangxi, was stabbed and bleeding heavily when he went to the countryside. He died after 8 days of rescue.
On the 20th, it was reported that Li Shengping, director of the Inspection Office of Ningyuan County Party Committee in Hunan, fell to his death. The cause is unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 18, the National Bureau of Statistics reported that in the first three quarters, the national per capita wage income was 17,696 yuan, the national per capita consumption expenditure was 20,631 yuan, and the national per capita disposable income was 30,941 yuan in the first three quarters, a nominal increase of 5.2% over the same period last year. Netizens replied, "My income after deducting insurance is 1,695", "I got 1,800", "I got 1,743 yuan, and it's still the unit"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 20 (Release), Bazhou, Hebei. Fan Kecheng, the head of Zhenghua Property Company in the city, reported to Xiang Xianwei, a judge of Langfang Intermediate Court, in his real name. Although Zhenghua Property Company had signed a property contract with Four Seasons Garden Phase II, Henan Tingrui Property ignored the eviction order of the housing and construction department and forcibly occupied the community. Zhenghua Property Company appealed, but was rejected by Xiang Xianwei.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 19, a netizen searched for "traitor portrait" on JD.com, and the search results showed a portrait of Mao Zedong. As of now, JD.com has blocked such keywords and stores.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 20 (Release) A Chinese living in Japan named "Fang Jie" posted a video about her experience of participating in two "Student Meal Parent Tasting Conferences" for her children. Fang Jie said that the middle school her children attend has more than 500 teachers and students, and is equipped with a dedicated nutritionist. Every year, the school invites parents to experience their children's lunch and introduces the food sources in detail. The nutritionist will also teach parents how to scientifically match meals.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens shared on Weibo the hardships they encountered during their two years of participating in the "Three Support and One Help" project.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 19 (Released) Changsha, Hunan. A man met a street vendor with a cane, selling pancakes on the street. He told the vendor that he had no money and asked if he could have a free meal at his place. The vendor readily agreed and made a pancake for the man. To express his gratitude, the man came here again the next day and gave the vendor a gift and a red envelope. The vendor said, "As long as we don't give up, life will always get better and better."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 18, the U.S. magazine "Time" announced that the late Hamas leader Sinwar appeared on the cover of the magazine's new issue. In the picture, Sinwar's head was placed in the center of a white background with a red cross drawn on it. Other politicians who have appeared on the cover of weekly magazines in this way include Saddam, Hitler, and Bin Laden.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 19, the Guandu District Joint Investigation Team issued a report: the principal was dismissed, the director of the District Education and Sports Bureau was suspended, and the company involved was fined 6.24 million yuan. However, according to parents, the dismissed principal Xia Xinren was supposed to retire at the end of this year, and the vice principal was not punished. It is reported that the school organized a parent meeting before, and a school leader did not agree to the parents on the scene to shoot a video, saying that the parents' questions were too "tricky". The school chairman ignored the last question and left the meeting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 19, Chinese mercenary "Lao Wang" and "The Warden" had a live broadcast and chatted: It is normal for Russian commanders to make mistakes. Many bodies could not be identified, so there was no compensation. "The Warden" said that 153 Chinese had been killed on his front line. "If you count, there will be more on your side." "On my side, the North Korean soldiers went in and died. It only took one day for eight people, and they were commanders."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Full version

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 19, Anhui. A woman posted a video saying that she often vomits blood and loses hair due to cancer. She can only live in the corridor with her daughter, and her husband's income from working hard is not enough for injections. The woman said she didn't know how long she could live, and if anyone needed her, she was willing to sell blood or platelets in exchange for income "just to give the child a place to live and a meal."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 19, Changsha, Hunan. A pair of parents, holding their ID cards, reported in their real names that Changsha Xiangya Second Hospital illegally organized (medical) students to obtain human organs. Their child, Luo Shuaiyu, jumped to his death in May this year. The parents suspected that their child's suicide was related to reporting the hospital leaders for organ trafficking. According to the child's parents, Luo Shuaiyu's computer contained recordings of hospital leaders cutting off patients' small intestines for transplantation and other evidence materials.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 14, Russia. Several Chinese students were stopped by two Russians on their way back to the dormitory and asked to show their passports. However, the two Russians were not wearing police uniforms and did not identify themselves. When the students asked about their identities, they were attacked with pepper spray and beaten on the ground. The students were injured to varying degrees. One student was seriously injured with "broken teeth and a broken nose." Similar attacks have occurred in many cities in Russia.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 19, Linxia, Gansu. A slogan "We support the Palestinian people, we are from China" is printed on the trunk of a takeaway boy's electric bike.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Kunming Changfeng School gave students rotten meat to eat, which attracted attention. On October 20, Guancha.com published an article saying that the Kunming Changfeng rotten meat incident must be condemned, but Japanese schools are by no means a model of food safety, and listed many "food poisoning" incidents in Japan. In response, many netizens questioned whether Weibo and other social platforms received money from the Japanese Ministry of Foreign Affairs and used the Kunming Changfeng School rotten meat incident to smear China.
